title: Halo vest fixation effectively maintains cervical alignment through intraoperative repositioning in patients with cervical spine instability
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Takafumi Arita, Osamu Kawano, Hiroaki Sakai, Yuichiro Morishita, Muneaki Masuda, Tetsuo Hayashi, Kensuke Kubota, Takeshi Maeda, Yasuharu Nakashima, Kazuya Yokota
